user_question: What are the latest discoveries about exoplanets and generate an artistic image of an imagined exoplanet landscape?
final_answer: Recent discoveries include the identification of a potentially habitable exoplanet in the Proxima Centauri system. Artistic image of an imagined exoplanet landscape generated. The exoplanet, Proxima Centauri b, is located 4.24 light-years away, has a mass similar to Earth, and orbits within the habitable zone of its star.
